price: 55.Usun nummâ madabay elle daffeyaanay şatta elle iyyaanal yanin, woh dudda leeh kaxxa reeda le Yallih xaqu kinni.
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
